name: Hospital Ride
description:
Your goal as hospital worker is to transport patient to surgery before he dies, but be careful not to knock down a doctor or furniture during transport. If the patient's health drops too much, try to find the pills.

This is a ludum dare 46 game that was created in less than 3 days.

Link to LD Jam page

If you encounter any bugs or you liked the game or you just want to write something, feel free to leave a comment ;).
